dialog.text: Gerblins! Get away from me you dirty Gerblins.

options.text: I am not a 'Gerblin', I am Magnus.
Why do you think I am a Gerblin?

dialog.text: That's exactly what a Gerblin would say! You're here to kill all of us and take my root beer barrels!

options.text: So what are you going to do?
How can we get out of here?

dialog.text: I've been falsely accused! I'm locked up here. They said I blew up the temple. I didn't blow up any damn temples, I blow up the earth!

options.text: Could the earth have had the temple ontop of it?

dialog.text: I don't blow up any temples. I get out those diamonds fom under them. Best there ever was, that's sure as shit true. That's my story and I'm sticking to it.

options.text: You got a plan to get out of here?

dialog.text: Yeah, Istus's temple. They said I blew it up. Never been there, don't much care for it all. I just get the diamonds.

options.text: You got a plan to get out of here?

dialog.text: I'm going to get out of here. I smelled diamonds, I know it.
